page.title: 20Hedgerows
page.content:
In the{hedgerows}I have noticed many plants, for example cow- parsley, yorkshire fog, dock leaves, nettles, buttercups, goose grass, daisies, white campion and clover. Hedges are usually made out of hawthorn, hazel and beech.
The{hedge by the Terril}is one thousand years old and there are about twenty species in it. It is the{old {parish boundary}between Waters Upton and Cherrington.
The two hedges near Moorbank Farm are damaged about once a month in car accidents. * * * * * * * * *
Work of pupils, staff and friends of Tibberton C.E.Primary School.
